subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: The purpose of this project is to “contribute to the national objective of poverty reduction within the framework of the Fifth National Development Plan (FNDP) which is being implemented in harmony with the MDGs”.  Specifically, the project aims “at contributing to the Government’s efforts to attain MDGs by focusing on localization of the MDGs at the community level thus responding directly to the needs of poor communities”.   The Project intends to achieve this through the adoption of three strategies namely: Participatory Development Management (PDM); Asset Based Community Development (ABCD); and Local-level Integrated Information Systems (LIIS). The project aims at developing working partnerships with other developmental agencies to complement its activities. This includes facilitation of easy access to micro-finance and mainstreaming of gender, HIV/AIDS and environmental concerns such as the impact of climate change.
subproject.title: Action Plans for MDGs at commu

title: Supporting attainment of MDGs at community level.
